listItems.title: Shankle pork loin landjaeger
listItems.description: Shankle pork loin landjaeger pork chop t-bone. Shank capicola strip steak, salami prosciutto ham hock venison. Short ribs meatloaf doner hamburger frankfurter tri-tip.
